description: A React component that displays a list of chat threads, showing relevant information such as unread counts and timestamps.

methods.name: timeAgo(ts)
methods.description: Returns a human-readable string representing the time elapsed since the given timestamp.

methods.name: ChatThreadList({ chats, contacts, currentUserId, selectedChatId, onSelectChat, isMobile })
methods.description: A functional component that renders a list of chat threads with the ability to select a chat.
